Name.description: The name for the new dataset group.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name for the new dataset group.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\-_]*  
Update requires: Replacement

KmsKeyArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name(ARN) of a AWS Key Management Service (KMS) key used to encrypt the datasets.
KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name(ARN) of a AWS Key Management Service (KMS) key used to encrypt the datasets.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: arn:aws.*:kms:.*:[0-9]{12}:key/.*  
Update requires: Replacement

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that has permissions to access the AWS Key Management Service (KMS) key. Supplying an IAM role is only valid when also specifying a KMS key.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that has permissions to access the AWS Key Management Service (KMS) key. Supplying an IAM role is only valid when also specifying a KMS key.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:([a-z\d-]+):iam::\d{12}:role/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Domain.description: The domain of a Domain dataset group.
Domain.markdownDescription:
The domain of a Domain dataset group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ECOMMERCE | VIDEO_ON_DEMAND  
Update requires: Replacement

DatasetGroupArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group.
DatasetGroupArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:([a-z\d-]+):personalize:.*:.*:.+  
Update requires: No interruption
